content.rendered:
André is a Marine Consultant with a background as Fleet Manager and Class Surveyor particularly in the Mediterranean. He has considerable experience in a wide range of surveys including damage surveys, condition surveys, pre-purchase surveys, docking, hull and machinery and statutory surveys. He is also experienced in investment analysis, casualty investigations and some plan approvals.

Contact

Lisbon | +351 96 396 4412

Discipline: Engineer
Specialism: Accident investigation, casualty management, investment analysis
